values.value: SELECT Id, SBQQ__NetAmount__c FROM sbqq__quote__c WHERE Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Error' AND Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Updated' AND Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Aborted' AND Tax_Calculation_Status__c <> 'Validation' AND SBQQ__NetAmount__c <> NULL AND SBQQ__NetAmount__c <> 0 AND SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.IsClosed = false and SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Probability < 99 AND SkipVertex__c = false AND LastModifiedDate >= YESTERDAY AND (SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.type='Remorse Refund' OR SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.type='Revenue Opportunity')
